long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Foot Scroll: A customizable, foot-friendly Chrome extension that offers directional buttons for smooth, hands-free scrolling. Adjust arrow size, colors, scroll speed, and more for effortless navigation

The extension remembers user preferences, including button size, colors, and scroll amounts. Each time the user opens a page, the extension loads with their saved customizations intact, offering a consistent experience.

Intuitive Directional UI: A user-friendly interface with four directional buttons (up, down, left, right) positioned at the center of the screen for easy and quick access to scrolling.

Scroll Amount Control: Whether you prefer smaller increments for precise navigation or larger amounts for quicker scrolling, you have full control.
